tasks.task: Build a shade structure for chickens in hot weather.
subtasks: Gather materials needed for the project (cattle panels, shade cloth, zip ties, cedar 2x4s).
Measure and cut the cattle panels to the desired size (3 panels for a 12 by 20 structure).
Attach the cattle panels together using zip ties or other securing methods.
Install the shade cloth on the cattle panels using zip ties to fasten the cloth securely.
Frame the entire structure with cedar 2x4s to provide stability and support.
Position the shade structure in a location accessible to the chickens, ensuring it provides adequate coverage.
Monitor the chickens' comfort and adjust the structure as needed during hot summer days.
